ShortDescription.LocalizedString: Transform SharePoint lists into hierarchical displays with advanced filtering and styling

LongDescription.LocalizedString: The Fancy List Web Part transforms standard SharePoint lists into visually appealing, hierarchical displays with advanced filtering and styling capabilities. Features include 3-level hierarchy (Category → Subject → Description), dynamic filtering, custom backgrounds, fonts, shapes, and auto-expand functionality. Perfect for organizing and displaying complex list data in an intuitive, user-friendly format.
